front.title: IKEv2 Extensions to Support Robust Header Compression over IPsec (RoHCoIPsec)

abstract.t: In order to integrate RoHC with IPsec [ROHCOIPSEC], a mechanism is needed to negotiate RoHC configuration parameters between end-points. Internet Key Exchange (IKE) is a mechanism which can be leveraged to handle these negotiations. This document specifies extensions to IKEv2 [IKEV2] that will allow RoHC and its associated configuration parameters to be negotiated for IPsec security associations (SAs).
